alert.note: Alert for New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 10 at 7:57AM EST until January 10 at 10:45AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE FITCHVILLE POND DAM ON THE YANTIC RIVER REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM EST THIS MORNING FOR CENTRAL NEW LONDON COUNTY... At 757 AM EST, emergency management reported the potential failure failure of Fitchville Pond Dam. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding from the potential failure of Fitchville Pond Dam. SOURCE...County dispatch. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas downstream from the Fitchville Pond Dam along the Yantic River. The nearest downstream town is Fitchville, located 0.1 mile. This includes the following streams and drainages... Pearson Brook and Yantic River. Flooding is occurring along the Yantic River. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE DAM FAILURE...IMMINENT
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. If you are in low lying areas below the Fitchville Pond Dam you should move to higher ground immediately.
